Package com.seailz.discordjv.model.component

Interface DisplayComponent

All Superinterfaces:
Compilerable, Component
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionRow
public interface DisplayComponent extends Component
Represents a component that is used to layout other RawComponents, such as SelectMenus
